content: गोपः (पी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [गुप्-अच्] {@--1@} One who guards or protects; शालिगोप्यो जगुर्यशः <ls>R. 4. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Hiding, concealment. {@--3@} Reviling, abuse. {@--4@} Flurry, agitation. {@--5@} Light, lustre, splendour.

--पः {1} a cowherd (considered as belonging to a mixed tribe); गोपवेशस्य विष्णोः <ls>Me. 15.</ls> {2} the chief of a cowpen. {3} the superintendent of a village. {4} a king. {5} a protector, guardian. (--पकः {1} the superintendent of a district. {2} myrrh. (--पिका {1} a cowherdess. {2} protectress. (--पी a cowherd's wife (especially applied to the cowherdesses of Vṛndāvana, the companions of Kṛṣṇa in his juvenile sports). {2} a milk-maid. {3} a protectress. {4} Nature, elementary nature.
